Dental Care

Expert dental & maxillofacial care in Ranchi with advanced technology, cosmetic dentistry, implantology, and preventive treatments

Overview

The Dental Care Department at Raj Hospitals, Ranchi, offers comprehensive oral health care ranging from preventive dentistry to advanced cosmetic and maxillofacial surgeries. With a specialized team of dentists, oral surgeons, implantologists, orthodontists, periodontists, and dental hygienists, we deliver world-class dental treatments with precision and safety. Our focus is on pain-free, affordable, and aesthetic oral health services, helping patients achieve healthy gums, perfect teeth alignment, and confident smiles. Equipped with the latest dental technology, Raj Hospitals is committed to providing personalized treatment plans, minimally invasive procedures, and safe recovery protocols for both adults and children.

Why Choose Our Dental Department

  • Team of cosmetic dentists, implantologists & orthodontists
  • Painless dentistry with advanced anesthesia and laser technology
  • Digital X-ray, 3D imaging & advanced diagnostics
  • High standards of hygiene with sterilization protocols
  • Affordable treatment packages

Key Facilities

Team of cosmetic dentists, implantologists & orthodontists
Painless dentistry with advanced anesthesia and laser
Well-equipped dental operation rooms
Comprehensive oral cancer screening & diagnosis
Digital X-ray, 3D imaging & advanced diagnostics
High standards of hygiene with sterilization protocols

Treatments We Offer

Comprehensive dental care with advanced techniques and personalized treatment plans

Cosmetic Dentistry & Smile Designing

Aesthetic treatments including smile designing, veneers, and teeth whitening to enhance your smile.

Root Canal Treatment (RCT)

Pain-free root canal treatments with advanced rotary endodontics for permanent tooth preservation.

Crowns & Bridges

Prosthetic restorations for missing or damaged teeth ensuring long-lasting strength and functionality.

Implant Surgery

Permanent solution for missing teeth with titanium dental implants.

Orthodontics & Braces

Treatment for crooked teeth including traditional braces and modern aligners.

Laser Gum Surgery & Pyorrhea Care

Advanced laser treatments for gum diseases and periodontal therapy.

Common conditions we diagnose and treat in our Dental department

Tooth Decay & Cavities
Gum Disease (Gingivitis & Periodontitis)
Tooth Extraction

Orthodontic Treatment (Braces)
Teeth Whitening

Oral Cancer
Jaw Disorders (TMJ)
Impacted Wisdom Teeth
Pediatric Dental Care

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about Dental conditions and treatments

Do you provide painless dental treatments?

Yes, we use advanced pain management and laser dentistry techniques for painless procedures.

What is the lifespan of dental implants?

Dental implants can last a lifetime with proper oral care, hygiene, and regular dental check-ups.

When should children visit a dentist?

Children should have their first dental visit by the age of one year or within six months of their first tooth eruption.

Is teeth whitening safe?

Yes, our expert dentists use clinically approved whitening methods that are safe and effective under supervision.

Have More Questions?
